career.title: Frontend Engineer
career.description: Developed custom WYSIWYG configurations for all institutions across all levels, designed and implemented UI for reusable functions and features in Vue and using Vuetify. Managed client tickets and worked with customers directly to troubleshoot and resolve issues on Production levels.

career.title: Software Engineer
career.description: Primarily worked on the Frontend implementing designs into code for reusable functions and features in Vue and React across multiple products. Worked closely with cross-function teams, developers, back end, designers, product managers to implement new designs. Made new greenfield product for use with internal CMS systems.

career.title: Full Stack Developer
career.description: Primarily worked as a Full Stack developer maintaining legacy codes. Followed the Agile/Lean methodology. Analyzed and identified areas for test automation by implementing stories.

career.title: Salesforce Developer
career.description: Analyzed and identified areas for improvement to organization's Salesforce Security Model. Worked with internal international teams to determine and configure desired Salesforce interaction. During this time I mentored and advised an IT intern project team that used MEAN stack structure for an internal application development.

career.title: Technology Leadership Program
career.description: Leadership focused training in Technology. Highly focused technical development training in full stack development, web accessibility, and implemented a prototype internal application for company wide usage. Engaged in specialized training to develop business and leadership abilities including but not limited to: project presentation, business negotiations, public speaking, interpersonal skills, and project planning.

aboutMe:
I'm a Software Engineer that loves to bring ideas to life since 2019.

"Form follows function" - Louis Sullivan, an American architect.
This quote encapsulate my approach to implementation. Establishing function is the start of a great foundation; at this point in technology design is limited by our imagination.

"Coding is a form of art where the tools are constantly changing and new mediums are created every day." - a quote by me, actually, I'm not sure, I've lived on the internet for so long I don't know what's original anymore... â˜º
